isu_bball <- isu_bball %>%
  filter(`#` != "") %>%                                  #filter out aggregate rows
  select(Player, MIN,                                         #remove the number variable and 
            grep("%", colnames(isu_bball),               #any columns with `%` in the name
                 value = T)) %>%
  mutate(sapply(grep("%", colnames(isu_bball),               #any columns with `%` in the name
                 value = T), #set necissary fields
                            as.numeric))       #to numeric)

Error in mutate_impl(.data, dots) : 
  Column `sapply(grep("%", colnames(isu_bball), value = T), as.numeric)` must be length 10 (the number of rows) or one, not 3
